articles.title: "Roads Of UP To Be Made Better Than America Before 2024": Nitin Gadkari - NDTV
articles.description: Union Road Transport and Highways Minister Nitin Gadkari on Friday gifted road projects worth Rs 8,000 crore to Uttar Pradesh and said that the roads of State will be made better than America's before 2024.
